title: Subtraction Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula: $${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2-2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:  parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared .
pacedSpeech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:    a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared

title: Compare the Binomial\n
speech: parentheses a minus b,  squared \n parentheses, 4 y cubed, minus 2  squared

title: Identify a

title: Identify $$b$$

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=4y^3$$ and $$b=2$$ into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(4y^3-2\right)}^2={\left(4y^3\right)}^2-2\times4y^3\times2+2^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to, 4 y cubed,  and  b is equal to 2  into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n parentheses, 4 y cubed, minus 2  squared is equal to parentheses 4 y cubed,  squared minus, 2 times 4 y cubed times 2 plus 2 squared

into the subtraction binomial square formula: ,  a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared
